borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">By reason of the siting, scale, bulk and massing of the proposed development, in addition to the </span><span style="font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">cumulative impact of the overall additions to the dwellinghouse,</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span><font face="PT Sans, sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt;">the proposed development will unduly dominate the dwelling which will no longer reflect the character of the original&nbsp;dwellinghouse. The development will result in harm to the appearance of the house&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt;">and impact the&nbsp;</span>openness<span style="font-size: 10.5pt;">&nbsp;of the corner plot, resulting in harm to the streetscene&nbsp;and character of the area, especially noting the siting within the Becontree Estate. Additionally, the proposed development will significantly reduce the useable amenity space at the dwelling, reducing the quality of&nbsp;</span>accommodation<span style="font-size: 10.5pt;">&nbsp;at the site.</span></font></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">As such, the proposed development is contrary to:<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">- National Planning Policy Framework&nbsp;National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">- Policy D4 of the London Plan (March 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">- Policy CP2 and CP3 of the&nbsp;Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the&nbsp;Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 7.5pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">- Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of&nbsp;The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</span></p>

<p style="margin: 0cm; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><font color="#242424" face="Segoe UI, sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt;">The application fails to provide sufficient clarity with&nbsp;</span>regards<span style="font-size: 10.5pt;">&nbsp;to the existing development at the application site. Specifically, the proposed block plan has omitted an existing single storey rear extension which the development seeks to retain.</span></font><font color="#242424" face="Segoe UI, sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt;">&nbsp;</span></font><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, sans-serif;">As such, t</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, sans-serif;">he proposal could prejudice third parties who may otherwise have wished to comment on the application; the proposed development cannot be accurately assessed and it cannot be demonstrated that it would be supported by the Development Plan. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:</span></p><p style="margin: 0cm; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 10.5pt;"><br></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm; background-image: initial; description: Construction of a part two storey part single storey side extension
